findings.title: Operator can mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The operator has the capability to mint tokens even after the initial deployment of the contract.

findings.title: Operator can burn tokens from own balance and allowanced balances
findings.description: The operator has the capability to burn tokens from their own balance as well as allowed balances.

findings.title: Operator can withdraw BLOB and foreign tokens from contract
findings.description: The operator has the capability to withdraw BLOB and foreign tokens from the contract, which may lead to unauthorized token transfers.
